name: Kassmasse
description: '''Fikiru Sema,''' known professionally as '''Kassmasse''' ([[Amharic]]: ካስማሰ), is an Ethiopian singer who is credited for his innovation of blending [[Ethiopian hip hop music|hip hop music]] to the traditional [[Music of Ethiopia|Ethiopian music]]. He was widely known for his first EP titled ''Maleda'' and the first album called ''Bahil/Weg'' (translated: "Culture") in 2022.
